title: Port Augusta: Woman charged with murder over stabbing death
text:
A woman has been charged with murder after a man was stabbed and killed in Port Augusta overnight.

Emergency services rushed to Meally St just after 11.30pm and found a 35-year-old man with stab wounds.

He was taken to the local hospital, but died shortly after.

Police then arrested a 34-year-old woman from Port Augusta who was found at a home on Mealy St. She was charged with murder this morning.

The two people were known to each other.

Major Crime Detectives and Crime Scene examiners from Adelaide are on the scene.

Anyone with information on the incident is asked to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
description: A woman has been charged with murder after a man was stabbed and killed in Port Augusta overnight.
